app.name: WiiSX
app.long_description:
Wii64 Team is: General Coder - emu_kidid Graphics & Menu Coder - sepp256 Audio & Core Coder - tehpola
The Wii64Team proudly presents WiiSX Beta 4.0 WiiSX is a port of PCSX to the Wii which uses the following: * pcsx-ReARMed * lightrec for dynamic recompilation * dfsound for audio via AESND * unai soft GPU * libgui for UI
Special Thanks to: pcercuei - lightrec notaz - pcsx-ReARMed drmr - Graphics shagkur/WinterMute - libogc/devkitPPC Team Twiizers for Wii homebrew
WiiSX and the WiiSX logo are trademarks of the Wii64 Team and should not be used in unofficial builds.
